heading: Rage of Harrogath â€“ Diablo 4 Unique Item
content: Rage of Harrogath is a Barbarian Unique Chest. This item has a tremendous ability to reduce the cooldowns of your shouts, which plague all Barbarians by taking up half of our Skill bar. Stacking up Lucky Hit to proc this chest can lead to nearly infinite up time of your Shouts. This is often used with to achieve almost infinite resets when playing Like all Unique items they provide a powerful effect that can't be found on any other item. These effects can't be moved around like resulting in limited flexibility when incorporating them into your build. Many Unique items change the way skills and builds work in significant ways. More info coming soon!
